definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

sentences.english: By recognizing the changing characteristics of your cervical mucus, you can predict when you'll ovulate.
sentences.chinese: 通過認識到宮頸粘液性狀的改變，可以預測排卵時間。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effect of "Cupai Decoction"in the treatment of ovulatory dysfunction.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察促排卵湯對排卵功能障礙的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effect of "Cupai Decoction"in the treatment of ovulatory dysfunction.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察促排卵湯對排卵功能障礙的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Studies clearly show that rifampin decreases the effectiveness of birth control pills in preventing ovulation.
sentences.chinese: 研究清楚顯示，利福平會降低避孕藥抑制排卵的效力。

sentences.english: Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) is defined as a syndrome of ovarian hyperandrogenism and chronic anovulation.
sentences.chinese: 多囊卵巢綜合徵以雄激素過多和持續無排卵爲特徵。

sentences.english: During the actual ovulation period, there are a number of telltale signs.
sentences.chinese: 在真正的排卵期，有一些跡象是你可以注意到的。

sentences.english: Oral birth control pills contain hormones that prevent ovulation and reduce the severity of menstrual cramps.
sentences.chinese: 口服含激素的藥片會阻止排卵和降低痛經的嚴重度。

sentences.english: Women who were not ovulating showed no similar variation in behavior.
sentences.chinese: 不排卵期的女性的，則在上類似的。

sentences.english: Wearing too much make-up can mask the scent that attracts men during ovulation.
sentences.chinese: 濃妝會掩蓋排卵期女性特有的吸引男人的氣味。

sentences.english: Apply the Peak Rule only after the Peak Day is identified.
sentences.chinese: 出現排卵時即認清峯日後，才運用峯日規則。

sentences.english: So women how to grasp the oviposit period?
sentences.chinese: 那麼女性如何掌握排卵期呢？

sentences.english: Oviposit date of the female is in commonly next time menstruation comes before tide 14 days or so.
sentences.chinese: 女性的排卵日期1般鄙人次月經來潮前的14天閣下。

sentences.english: This should be the longest point away from ovulation.
sentences.chinese: 這個時間點是最不可能排卵的。

sentences.english: Ovulatory dysfunction is a major cause of sterility.
sentences.chinese: 排卵功能障礙是造成不孕的一個主要原因。

sentences.english: As for women who are ovulating and don't want to advertise that fact?
sentences.chinese: 假如婦女們不想讓人知道自己處於排卵期？

sentences.english: Once ovulation resumes, you can become pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 一旦排卵恢復則有可能受孕。

definition: luteal phase (period in the menstrual cycle when an embryo can implant in the womb)
corpus luteum (glands in female mammals producing progesterone)
to stop menstruating (as a result of pregnancy, menopause or medical condition etc)
